alert.note: Alert for Mills (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 28 at 2:25PM CDT until April 28 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HAMILTON...NORTHWESTERN CORYELL...NORTHEASTERN LAMPASAS AND SOUTHEASTERN MILLS COUNTIES... At 225 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Evant, or 18 miles southwest of Hamilton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Evant, Pearl, Moline, Center City, South Purmela, Bee House, Star, Ireland, Izoro, Purmela, Adamsville and Pecan Wells. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Texas.
